analyzed: thub pa chen po'i 'di bse ru lta bu la sogs pa'i rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa las khyad par ni bag chags spangs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no // lus dang dbang po dang blo dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa ni sdug bsngal gyi yin par nges pa la de las bzlog pa bdag med par mthong ba ni gnyen po yin gyi /
translated: The distinctive feature of the Great Muni is that he has eliminated the imprints.üîΩThe apprehension of a self and entities connected to the self in relation to the body, faculties, mind, feelings, and so on is definitely the cause of suffering. The antidote to that is the vision of selflessness.

original: sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes med pa'i phyir bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas byas pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes med pa'i phyir bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas byas pa'o //
translated: It is not the case that the apprehension of a self and entities connected to the self is created by the perception of suffering.

original: rnam pa mang po thabs mang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni de las bsgom pa la sogs pas ni de la bsgoms pa cig phul du byung bas rnam pa thams cad mthong ba yin na /
analyzed: rnam pa mang po thabs mang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni de las bsgom pa la sogs pas ni de la bsgoms pa cig phul du byung bas rnam pa thams cad mthong ba yin na /
translated: As for the many aspects, many methods, and so on, it is said that through meditation and so on, one who has perfected meditation sees all aspects.

original: rgyu 'joms pa phul du byung ba yin la /
analyzed: rgyu 'joms pa phul du byung ba yin la /
translated: The cause is the perfection of destruction.

original: de las kyang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi thabs goms pas de yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes de dag tsam bstan pa yin gyi de dag tsam gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de las kyang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi thabs goms pas de yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes de dag tsam bstan pa yin gyi de dag tsam gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: And from that, through the method of cultivating the qualities of superknowledge and so on, one possesses perfect qualities. Thus, only those are taught, but omniscience is not just those.

original: nyan thos la sogs pas rnam par dbye ba med pas thal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pas rnam par dbye ba med pas thal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Thinking that it would follow that there would be no distinction from ≈õrƒÅvakas and so on,

original: yang na gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúOr, if that is so,‚Äù and so on.

original: rgol ba 'di @300a * //
analyzed: rgol ba 'di @300a * //
translated: This objection

original: la yang dang yang du lan btab pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: la yang dang yang du lan btab pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: is taught to be a repeated response.üîΩThe explanation here

original: 'di la bshad pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is said to be as follows.

original: 'khor ba pa'i skyon yon mtha' dag gsal lo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'khor ba pa'i skyon yon mtha' dag gsal lo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The faults and virtues of cyclic existence are clear.

original: sna tshogs pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The variety is twofold:

original: yon tan gyi phyogs dang skyon gyis kyang ngo zhes bya ba ste /üîΩrnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan gyi phyogs dang skyon gyis kyang ngo zhes bya ba ste / rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the side of virtue and the side of vice.üîΩThere is no other variety.

original: btang snyoms su bya ba yang blang bya ma yin te /
analyzed: btang snyoms su bya ba yang blang bya ma yin te /
translated: One should not be indifferent to the variety, because it is not to be accepted.

original: dor bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dor bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is to be rejected.

original: rnam pa du mar thabs mang po ni spros pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa du mar thabs mang po ni spros pa ste /
translated: The many varieties are elaborations, which are many methods.

original: de la re zhig las dang 'bras bu dang 'brel pa yongs su shes pa'i thabs bstan pa ni dran pa ste /
analyzed: de la re zhig las dang 'bras bu dang 'brel pa yongs su shes pa'i thabs bstan pa ni dran pa ste /
translated: The method of understanding the connection between action and result is mindfulness.

original: goms pa dang bcas pa'i dran pas yid kyi gsal ba nyid 'di la mthong ba'i nus pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: goms pa dang bcas pa'i dran pas yid kyi gsal ba nyid 'di la mthong ba'i nus pa nyid yin no //
translated: The clarity of the mind with mindfulness is the power of seeing.

original: de'i tshe nyams su myong ba gsal ba ni dran pa'i gsal ba'i sgrub byed ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe nyams su myong ba gsal ba ni dran pa'i gsal ba'i sgrub byed ma yin te /
translated: At that time, the clarity of experience is not the proof of the clarity of mindfulness.

original: yid gsal po med pa 'dod pa yin na de yod na skye ba snga ma la nyams su myong ba dran pa yin la /
analyzed: yid gsal po med pa 'dod pa yin na de yod na skye ba snga ma la nyams su myong ba dran pa yin la /
translated: If the clarity of the mind is not accepted, then the memory of experience in a previous life arises when it exists.

original: gang gi phyir gang zhig dran par 'dod pas sems kyi 'bad rtsol lam /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang zhig dran par 'dod pas sems kyi 'bad rtsol lam /
translated: If one wishes to remember something, then the mind makes an effort.

original: chu tshod dang thun phyed dang thun la sogs par nyams su myong ba dran pa yin na /
analyzed: chu tshod dang thun phyed dang thun la sogs par nyams su myong ba dran pa yin na /
translated: If one remembers the experience of a period of time, a half-period, a period, etc.,

original: nyin zhag la byung ba la yang dran la /
analyzed: nyin zhag la byung ba la yang dran la /
translated: then one remembers what occurred in a day.

original: de bzhin du zla ba phyed pa dang zla ba dang po la sogs pa'i rim gyis byis pa'i bar du dran pa yin zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du zla ba phyed pa dang zla ba dang po la sogs pa'i rim gyis byis pa'i bar du dran pa yin zhing /
translated: Similarly, one remembers in order, a half-month, a month, etc., up to one‚Äôs childhood.

original: yid kyi dran pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin na skye ba gzhan la nyams su myong ba yang dran pa la yin par srid pa yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi dran pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin na skye ba gzhan la nyams su myong ba yang dran pa la yin par srid pa yin te /
translated: If one has the power of mental memory, it is possible that one remembers what one experienced in other lives,

original: goms pa dang ldan pa phul du byung ba ni gcig tu mi gnas pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: goms pa dang ldan pa phul du byung ba ni gcig tu mi gnas pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the power of memory of one who is accustomed to it is of an outstanding nature and does not remain the same.

original: de las kyang de las gzhan pa yin pa'i phyir skye ba thog ma med pa nas brgyud pa dran pa yin na de'i rgyu dang de'i 'bras bu dang de'i khyad par yang de'i khyad par skyed par byed pa nyid la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nyams
analyzed: de las kyang de las gzhan pa yin pa'i phyir skye ba thog ma med pa nas brgyud pa dran pa yin na de'i rgyu dang de'i 'bras bu dang de'i khyad par yang de'i khyad par skyed par byed pa nyid la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nyams
translated: If one remembers the succession of lives from beginningless time, then the cause of that memory, its result, and its special qualities, which are produced by its special qualities, are also remembered.

original: su myong ba la rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: su myong ba la rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that the realization is in the experience of the other is:

original: de'i tshe de'i rjes su 'brang bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i rjes su 'brang bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time, by following that, . . .‚Äù

original: de bzhin du rang gi rgyud la 'brel pa bzung ba'i 'bras bu dang / de'i khyad par yang gzhan la rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi rgyud la 'brel pa bzung ba'i 'bras bu dang / de'i khyad par yang gzhan la rtogs pa yin na /
translated: Similarly, if the result of the relation in one‚Äôs own continuum and its distinction are realized in the other,

original: de'i rgyu dang de'i 'bras bu yang mngon par rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni ;
analyzed: de'i rgyu dang de'i 'bras bu yang mngon par rtogs pa yin par bstan pa ni ;
translated: the teaching that its cause and its result are also realized is:üîΩ‚ÄúJust as one who has come from another village . . .‚Äù

original: ji ltar grong gzhan nas 'ongs pa zhes bya ba shes 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dang sbyor ba'i rgyu bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ji ltar grong gzhan nas 'ongs pa zhes bya ba shes 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dang sbyor ba'i rgyu bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the cause of the application is:

original: de dang brten pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dang brten pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy relying on that . . .‚Äù

original: de rig ba ni /
analyzed: de rig ba ni /
translated: The knowledge of that is:

original: de dang 'brel pa rig pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa rig pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe knowledge of the relation with that . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe application to the occasion is:

original: gnas skabs dang sbyor ba ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gnas skabs dang sbyor ba ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn the same way . . .‚Äù

original: rang gi rgyud la las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa shes pas @300b gzhan la yang las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa shes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud la las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa shes pas @300b gzhan la yang las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa shes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that by knowing the relation of action and result in one‚Äôs own continuum, one also knows the relation of action and result in the other.

original: de dang brten pa zhes bya ba ni grong gzhan bsten pa'o //
analyzed: de dang brten pa zhes bya ba ni grong gzhan bsten pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy relying on that‚Äù means by relying on another village.

original: lkog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'o //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúConcealed‚Äù means existing in the mental continuum of another person.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni rang gi rgyud la mngon sum gyis so //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni rang gi rgyud la mngon sum gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù means by direct perception in one‚Äôs own mental continuum.

original: gzhan gyi rgyud la ni rjes su dpag pas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyud la ni rjes su dpag pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy inference‚Äù means in the mental continuum of another.

original: so sor nges pa ni khyad par can gyi yul la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: so sor nges pa ni khyad par can gyi yul la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDistinct‚Äù means the object, etc., that are distinctive.

original: de dang 'brel pa ni las la yod pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa ni las la yod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúRelated to that‚Äù means existing in the action.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIts effect‚Äù means the activity.

original: de dag gi khyad par de la nges par rtog pa na rang gi rgyud la yid gsal ba las byung ba'i mngon sum gyis yin la /
analyzed: de dag gi khyad par de la nges par rtog pa na rang gi rgyud la yid gsal ba las byung ba'i mngon sum gyis yin la /
translated: When one ascertains the distinction of those, it is by direct perception arising from the clear mind in one‚Äôs own mental continuum.

original: de'i tshe yang de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang dbye ba rnams kyi 'brel pa ni 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid de rigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang dbye ba rnams kyi 'brel pa ni 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid de rigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: At that time, the relation of cause and effect and the relation of nature and effect are taught to be the reason for the relation of cause and effect and nature and effect.

original: rgyu'i rang bzhin dang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i rang bzhin dang zhes bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe nature of the cause‚Äù means the cause.

original: de ltar 'brel pa rigs pa yin na gzhan la yang rjes su 'jug pa yin par bstan pas rigs pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs yin la /
analyzed: de ltar 'brel pa rigs pa yin na gzhan la yang rjes su 'jug pa yin par bstan pas rigs pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs yin la /
translated: Thus, if the relation is a correct principle, it is a correct principle because it is taught that it is to be applied to other cases as well.üîΩThis is the reason.

original: so sor nges pa ni las so //
analyzed: so sor nges pa ni las so //
translated: Individual determination is the action.

original: rang bzhin thams cad rjes su dpog pa zhes bya ba ni rim pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin thams cad rjes su dpog pa zhes bya ba ni rim pa'o //
translated: Inferring all natures is the order.

original: las dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa ste /
analyzed: las dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa ste /
translated: The action and result are what exist in one's own and others' continuums.

original: sogs pa'i sgras bye brag gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras bye brag gzung ngo //
translated: The word etc. includes the distinctions.

original: de ltar gzhan gyis smras pa la /
analyzed: de ltar gzhan gyis smras pa la /
translated: Thus, in response to what others have said,

original: 'dir chos mkhyen pa 'ba' zhig 'gegs par sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir chos mkhyen pa 'ba' zhig 'gegs par sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir /
translated: here, only the knower of phenomena is refuted.

original: da dgag par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: da dgag par bstan pa ni /
translated: Now, the refutation is taught:

original: mtho ris dang ni byang grol lam /üîΩtsam gyis ni zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med kyang ngo //
analyzed: mtho ris dang ni byang grol lam / tsam gyis ni zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med kyang ngo //
translated: The path to heaven and liberationüîΩ is not established by mere knowledge of the world.üîΩMere means that even without omniscience,

original: thams cad mkhyen ba nyid yang thabs yod par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen ba nyid yang thabs yod par bstan pa ni /
translated: the existence of omniscience is taught:üîΩThe path to omniscience for all beings

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag ces bya ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag ces bya ste /
translated: is taught by the one who has omniscience.

original: phan tshun zhes bya ba ni rgyu la ltos pa'i 'bras bu dang / de la yang ltos pa'i rgyu yang rgyu yin gyi rgyu nyid la ltos nas 'bras bu'am rgyu'am cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phan tshun zhes bya ba ni rgyu la ltos pa'i 'bras bu dang / de la yang ltos pa'i rgyu yang rgyu yin gyi rgyu nyid la ltos nas 'bras bu'am rgyu'am cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúMutually‚Äù means that the effect is dependent on the cause, and the cause is dependent on the effect. The meaning is that the cause is the cause in dependence on the effect, but the effect is not the effect in dependence on the cause.

original: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What follows from this?

original: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚Äúthe so-called cause and effect.‚Äù

original: rnam pa du ma zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dang rgyu dag gi rang gi ngo bo dang de'i khyad par rnams kyi dngos po ni 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa du ma zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dang rgyu dag gi rang gi ngo bo dang de'i khyad par rnams kyi dngos po ni 'brel pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn many ways‚Äù means that the nature and the particulars of the cause and effect are related.

original: de bsgoms pa ni shes pa ste /
analyzed: de bsgoms pa ni shes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúCultivating that‚Äù means knowing that.

original: de dang rjes su 'brel pa ni yang dang yang du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de dang rjes su 'brel pa ni yang dang yang du 'byung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBeing connected with that‚Äù means occurring repeatedly.

original: des na de'i bskyed bya'i khyad par 'dzin na mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i rigs pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de'i bskyed bya'i khyad par 'dzin na mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i rigs pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it grasps the particulars of what is produced by that, it is the consciousness of all migrating beings, by the reasoning that it is what is desired.

original: ji lta bu'i rnam par mthong ba de lta bu'i rnam par nye ba yin par mtshon par byed pa'i phyir mthong ba dang thun mong ba de ma yin pa las ldog pa'i @301a * //
analyzed: ji lta bu'i rnam par mthong ba de lta bu'i rnam par nye ba yin par mtshon par byed pa'i phyir mthong ba dang thun mong ba de ma yin pa las ldog pa'i @301a * //
translated: Because it is indicated that the object is similar to the way it is seen, it is not a non-common seeing.

original: ngo bos 'jug pa'i yul rtogs par byed pa rjes su dpag pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: ngo bos 'jug pa'i yul rtogs par byed pa rjes su dpag pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it an inference that comprehends an object that engages through the nature of being the opposite of that which is not common?

original: khyad par gyi rnam pa dang 'brel pa yin yang rnam par rtog pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khyad par gyi rnam pa dang 'brel pa yin yang rnam par rtog pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though it is related to a specific aspect, it is conceptual,

original: spyi'i yul can yin gyi mngon sum gyi ni ma yin no /
analyzed: spyi'i yul can yin gyi mngon sum gyi ni ma yin no /
translated: so it has a general object, but it is not direct perception.

original: mngon sum gyi gang gi skad cig ma mthong ba de'i rgyun la rgyun gzhan las ldog pas rnam par gzhag par byed na /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi gang gi skad cig ma mthong ba de'i rgyun la rgyun gzhan las ldog pas rnam par gzhag par byed na /
translated: If it is posited that the continuum of what is seen in a moment of direct perception is stopped from another continuum,

original: 'jug pa'i yul la ltos nas kyang khyad par gyi yul mngon sum du byed pa yin gyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul la ltos nas kyang khyad par gyi yul mngon sum du byed pa yin gyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te /
translated: then even in dependence on the engaged object, the specific object is made directly perceptible, but it is not inference,

original: spyi'i yul can ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: spyi'i yul can ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: because it is not a conceptual cognition that has a general object.

original: 'on te rjes su dpag pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te rjes su dpag pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or is it inference?

original: mngon sum ni rang gi ngo bos dngos po mthong ba yin la /
analyzed: mngon sum ni rang gi ngo bos dngos po mthong ba yin la /
translated: Direct perception is the seeing of a thing by its own nature.üîΩInference is the positing of a thing that is not directly seen but is ascertained by seeing something else.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni dngos su ma mthong yang nges pa can mthong ba las rnam par 'jog pa yin no nges pa can mthong bas khyad par du byed pa ni 'jug pa'i yul la skad cig gi khyad par gyis khyad par du mi byed pa ni ma
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni dngos su ma mthong yang nges pa can mthong ba las rnam par 'jog pa yin no nges pa can mthong bas khyad par du byed pa ni 'jug pa'i yul la skad cig gi khyad par gyis khyad par du mi byed pa ni ma
translated: The object of engagement is distinguished by the distinction of momentariness.

original: yin no // 'di spyi'i yul can yin pa ni khyad par ma mthong bas byas pa yin te /
analyzed: yin no // 'di spyi'i yul can yin pa ni khyad par ma mthong bas byas pa yin te /
translated: The object of inference is a universal, because it is produced by the non-seeing of distinctions.

original: rtags ni spyi'i yul can du brjod pa khyad par mi gnas zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: rtags ni spyi'i yul can du brjod pa khyad par mi gnas zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: The reason is said to be an object of a universal, because it does not abide in distinctions.

original: tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i mtshan nyid 'chad pa pos gzung ba dang 'jug pa'i yul la sogs pa'i yul gyi dbye ba byas pas bstan par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i mtshan nyid 'chad pa pos gzung ba dang 'jug pa'i yul la sogs pa'i yul gyi dbye ba byas pas bstan par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The definition of conventional valid cognition is not taught by the author of the treatise through the classification of objects such as apprehended object and engaged object,

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would be contradictory.

original: rnam 'grel mdzad pa po'i de lta bu'i sgrogs pa rnams ni don dam pa'i lus la yin gyi tha snyad du gdon par 'os pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam 'grel mdzad pa po'i de lta bu'i sgrogs pa rnams ni don dam pa'i lus la yin gyi tha snyad du gdon par 'os pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The statements of the author of the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å avaÃÑrtika are in terms of the ultimate body, but it is not appropriate to take them literally.üîΩHere, it is reasonable to posit that that which is seen or ascertained is the object of engagement.

original: de la ni mthong ba'am nges pa can mthong ba ni 'jug pa'i yul du rnam par 'jog par byed pa 'di nyid rigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /üîΩrnam kun rjes dpog gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la ni mthong ba'am nges pa can mthong ba ni 'jug pa'i yul du rnam par 'jog par byed pa 'di nyid rigs pa yin par bstan pa ni / rnam kun rjes dpog gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is said thatüîΩInference is in all cases.

original: rnam pa thams cad rjes su dpog pa ni goms pa dang bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad rjes su dpog pa ni goms pa dang bcas pa yin la /
translated: Inference is always accompanied by conceptualization.

original: mngon sum nyid ni mngon du byed pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba mi rigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mngon sum nyid ni mngon du byed pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba mi rigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But is it not unreasonable to say that perception is not a direct engagement?

original: dbang po dang don du phrad pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum yin te /
analyzed: dbang po dang don du phrad pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum yin te /
translated: A consciousness that is in contact with a sense faculty and an object is perception.

original: dbang po las byung ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: dbang po las byung ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Because it arises from the sense faculties.üîΩIn response to this, it is said,

original: dbang po dang ni phrad pas kyang //üîΩzhes bya ba ste //
analyzed: dbang po dang ni phrad pas kyang //üîΩzhes bya ba ste //
translated: Even when there is contact with the sense faculty.

original: mngon sum du dbang po tshol ba ni mngon du byed pa'i don kho nas yin gyi ma mthong ba'i don ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum du dbang po tshol ba ni mngon du byed pa'i don kho nas yin gyi ma mthong ba'i don ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the sense faculty is sought in direct perception only in the sense of being manifest, not in the sense of not being seen.

original: don thams cad zlos pa'i tshig gi dbang po la 'bras bu nyid du brjod pas mtshan nyid kho nas ldan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: don thams cad zlos pa'i tshig gi dbang po la 'bras bu nyid du brjod pas mtshan nyid kho nas ldan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Since the sense faculty is stated to be the result of the words that repeat all objects, it is not endowed by its mere definition,

original: sbyor bar byed pa @301b ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sbyor bar byed pa @301b ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because it is not the agent of connection. This is taught:

original: 'di ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: This is not the definition of direct perception.

original: sbyor bar byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sbyor bar byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that it is the agent of connection is:

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: However,

original: dbang po ni 'di nyid kyi ming la nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: dbang po ni 'di nyid kyi ming la nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
translated: The sense faculty is indicated by its own name,

original: don gcig la tshogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni dbang po ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gcig la tshogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni dbang po ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is the collection of a single object. This is taught: The sense faculty...

original: mngon sum du tha snyad 'dogs pa la dbang po sbyor ba ma yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: mngon sum du tha snyad 'dogs pa la dbang po sbyor ba ma yin du zin kyang /
translated: Even though the sense faculty is not the agent of connection in the designation of direct perception,

original: sbyor bar byed pa'i rang gi ngo bor snang ba ni sbyor byed kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: sbyor bar byed pa'i rang gi ngo bor snang ba ni sbyor byed kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The form that appears as the instrument of contact is only the instrument of contact.

original: gzhan yang gang zhig ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang zhig ces bya ba smos te /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: mngon du byed pa ni dbang po'i skyed byed ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa ni dbang po'i skyed byed ma yin te /
translated: What is manifest is not the producer of the sense faculty,

original: de yod kyang gzhan gyi rnam rtog gi gnas skabs dang ; gnyi ga rab ri ba can gyis shes pa'i gnas skabs na don mngon du mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod kyang gzhan gyi rnam rtog gi gnas skabs dang ; gnyi ga rab ri ba can gyis shes pa'i gnas skabs na don mngon du mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even when it exists, the object is not manifest in the state of the other conceptual cognition, or in the state of cognition of both.

original: 'on te dbang po la nyams pa 'di'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te dbang po la nyams pa 'di'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But if it is said that the sense faculty is the cause of the impairment of this,

original: khyad par dang bcas pa 'khrul pa can ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par dang bcas pa 'khrul pa can ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: and that therefore it is not mistaken with a distinction,

original: de ni dbang po nyid ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni dbang po nyid ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said: It is not the sense faculty itself.

original: mngon du mi byed pa ni dbang po ma yin te zhes bya ba'i ngag yin la /
analyzed: mngon du mi byed pa ni dbang po ma yin te zhes bya ba'i ngag yin la /
translated: The statement is: What is not manifest is not the sense faculty.

original: de las bzlog pa rjes su shes pa yin te /üîΩgzhan du na khyad par don med pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa rjes su shes pa yin te / gzhan du na khyad par don med pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The opposite of that is subsequent cognition.

original: mngon du byed rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mngon du byed rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, the distinction would be pointless. This is shown by: the cause of manifestation.

original: dbang po la sogs pa'i bskyed bya yang mngon du byed pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa'i bskyed bya yang mngon du byed pa ni /
translated: The objects that are produced, such as the sense faculties, are also manifested.

original: yid gsal ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir dbang pos byas pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yid gsal ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir dbang pos byas pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The production of the sense faculties, etc. is also not done by the sense faculties, because it follows the clarity of mind and is concomitant with its arising and ceasing.üîΩThis is demonstrated by the phrase ‚ÄúMoreover, . . .

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and also others.üîΩ

original: mnyam par gzhag pa dang 'grel pa las ni rnam par 'khrug pa nyid dang bral ba las te /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa dang 'grel pa las ni rnam par 'khrug pa nyid dang bral ba las te /
translated: In the case of one who is concentrated, it is due to the absence of disturbance.

original: dbang po la sogs pa rnams yod na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa rnams yod na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the sense faculties, etc. exist, . . .

original: de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni /
translated: This is demonstrated by the phrase

original: dbang po'i shes pa yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe sense consciousnesses, etc. . . .

original: de'i phyir yid tsam gyi rnam rtog tsam la ni mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩgal te 'das pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa rjes su dpag pa la brten pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yid tsam gyi rnam rtog tsam la ni mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to // gal te 'das pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa rjes su dpag pa la brten pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: ‚Äù Therefore, it is not the case that they do not arise in mere mind and mere conceptualization.

original: mngon du byed pa yod pas na //
analyzed: mngon du byed pa yod pas na //
translated: If it is argued that the sense consciousnesses, etc. are not produced by mind, because they are not concomitant with mind, because they are not mental factors, and because they are not concomitant with mind, this is not so.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo snang ba yin na'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo snang ba yin na'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause they are not concomitant with mind‚Äù means that they are not concomitant with the mental consciousness.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúbecause they are not mental factors‚Äù means that they are not concomitant with the five consciousnesses.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúbecause they are not concomitant with mind‚Äù means that they are not concomitant with the mental consciousness.

original: lkog gyur ma yin med par 'gyur //
analyzed: lkog gyur ma yin med par 'gyur //
translated: It would not exist if it were not hidden.

original: zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba la yang lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba la yang lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that if it were not hidden, it would not exist in the present.

original: 'on te dbang po'i byed pa las zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba la'o //
analyzed: 'on te dbang po'i byed pa las zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba la'o //
translated: Or, if it is from the activity of the sense faculty,üîΩit is in the present.

original: rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni da ltar bzhin du 'das pa la sogs pa la yang rtags yod pas rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni da ltar bzhin du 'das pa la sogs pa la yang rtags yod pas rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: All aspects means that, like the present, the past, etc. are also understood because of the existence of a sign.

original: @302a * // mig la sogs pa'i byed pa yang //
analyzed: @302a * // mig la sogs pa'i byed pa yang //
translated: The activity of the eye, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'o //
translated: is in the present.

original: gal te 'das pa la sogs pa'i dngos po mngon du byed pa la dbang po'i bya ba ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te 'das pa la sogs pa'i dngos po mngon du byed pa la dbang po'i bya ba ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If the activity of the sense faculty is in the present, how can it manifest past, etc. things?

original: dbang po dang lhan cig byed pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /üîΩ'das pa'i dngos po la ni 'das pa kho na dbang po'i bya ba yin la /
analyzed: dbang po dang lhan cig byed pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la / 'das pa'i dngos po la ni 'das pa kho na dbang po'i bya ba yin la /
translated: It is not that it is a co-operating condition with the sense faculty.üîΩThe activity of the sense faculty in relation to past things is only past.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba lhan cig byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba lhan cig byed pa yin te /
translated: In relation to future things, it is a co-operating condition for future things.

original: de lta bu nyid du rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta bu nyid du rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is just that which is to be inferred.

original: rnam pa thams cad rjes su dpog pa la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad rjes su dpog pa la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by ‚Äúin the inference of all aspects.

original: de'i tshe nyid skyes pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe nyid skyes pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚Äù At that time, it is called ‚Äúarisen‚Äù because it is not direct perception.

original: mngon sum ma yin na ni de yang mngon sum ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum ma yin na ni de yang mngon sum ma yin pa'o //
translated: If it is not direct perception, then that also is not direct perception.

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid yin na da ltar ba nyid kho na yin te /
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid yin na da ltar ba nyid kho na yin te /
translated: If it is not hidden, then it is only present,üîΩbecause it is pervaded by that.

original: de des khyab pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de des khyab pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If you think this,

original: gal te byung ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te byung ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is taught by ‚Äúif it is arisen.

original: de ni de'i tshe 'das pa la sogs pa yin no zhes de skad du smra ba su yin zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ni de'i tshe 'das pa la sogs pa yin no zhes de skad du smra ba su yin zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: ‚Äù Who says that it is past, etc. at that time?

original: mngon du byed pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: This is taught by ‚Äúit is made manifest.

original: thams cad du ni da ltar ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad du ni da ltar ba la yang ngo //
translated: ‚Äù It is also present in all cases.

original: mngon du byed pa med kyang mi slu ba can yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa la yod pa ni de'i phyir de las gzhan pa kho na yod pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa med kyang mi slu ba can yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa la yod pa ni de'i phyir de las gzhan pa kho na yod pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Because it is non-deceptive even though not manifest, it exists in inference. Therefore, it exists only in something other than that.

original: gal te me la sogs pa mngon du ma byas pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te me la sogs pa mngon du ma byas pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said that fire, etc. are not manifest,

original: rjes du dpag pa la yang snang ba kho nar brtag par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: rjes du dpag pa la yang snang ba kho nar brtag par bya ba yin te /
translated: it should be considered to appear only in inference,üîΩbecause it is ascertained in that way.

original: de ltar nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not taught,

original: der yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because it is said that even there,

original: snang ba dang rnam par brtags pa dag gcig pa nyid du zhen pa kho na rjes su dpag pa yin par bstan to //
analyzed: snang ba dang rnam par brtags pa dag gcig pa nyid du zhen pa kho na rjes su dpag pa yin par bstan to //
translated: it is only the conception of the identity of appearance and conception that is taught to be inference.

original: gzhan du na rjes su dpag pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na rjes su dpag pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, inference would not operate.

original: snang ba ni mthong du rung ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: snang ba ni mthong du rung ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't appearance suitable to be seen?

original: mthong ba'i yul ma yin par ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba'i yul ma yin par ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why wouldn't it be unsuitable to be seen?

original: mi 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To teach that it is not so, it says when following what is seen.

original: ci las yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci las yin zhe na /
translated: What is the action?

original: gzhan du mi 'thad pa ste ma 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad pa ste ma 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not tenable that it is something else, because that would be unrelated.

original: snang ba nyid khyab byed du gzung ba ni rjes su dpag par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: snang ba nyid khyab byed du gzung ba ni rjes su dpag par bya ba yin la /
translated: The pervasion of appearance is grasped as the object of inference.

original: mi snang ba nyid yin na mig la sogs pa gzhan gyi don byed pa yin zhes bya bas mi snang ba'i 'dus pa can ma yin pa gzhan gyi don nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi snang ba nyid yin na mig la sogs pa gzhan gyi don byed pa yin zhes bya bas mi snang ba'i 'dus pa can ma yin pa gzhan gyi don nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not an appearance, then the eye and so on would be a benefit for something else. Thus, it would be established that the non-appearance is a benefit for something else that is not a collection.

original: de'i phyir snang ba zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i mtshon byed ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir snang ba zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i mtshon byed ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the so-called appearance is not an indicator of existence.

original: 'on kyang yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: However, it is only existent.

original: @302b gang du rtags kho na mngon sum yin gyi rtags can gang gi yang ma yin te /
analyzed: @302b gang du rtags kho na mngon sum yin gyi rtags can gang gi yang ma yin te /
translated: In some cases, only the sign is direct perception, but not the possessor of the sign.

original: de lta bu'i yul la ma mthong zhing mi snang la /
analyzed: de lta bu'i yul la ma mthong zhing mi snang la /
translated: In such a case, the object is not seen and does not appear.

original: mthong bar mi 'gyur ba rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: mthong bar mi 'gyur ba rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that what is not seen is not an object of inference?

original: mngon du byed pa las yod pa gzhan ji ltar ma yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa las yod pa gzhan ji ltar ma yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: How could it be that what is made manifest is different from what exists?

original: de la yang 'brel pa can kho na mthong ba ni gzhan du mi 'thad pas mthong bar 'gyur ba kho na rjes su dpag par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de la yang 'brel pa can kho na mthong ba ni gzhan du mi 'thad pas mthong bar 'gyur ba kho na rjes su dpag par bya ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, since it is not tenable that one sees only the related object, it is only what is seen that is inferred,

original: mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is nondeceptive.

original: mi snang ba la ni slu ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mi snang ba la ni slu ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not deceptive with regard to what is not seen.

original: gal te da ltar ba med pa na ma 'ongs pa ji ltar 'byung /
analyzed: gal te da ltar ba med pa na ma 'ongs pa ji ltar 'byung /
translated: If the present does not exist, how could the future arise?

original: 'di gzhan las kyang 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di gzhan las kyang 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not arise from another.

original: bden te / de'i bskyed bya 'am des 'dus byas pa las yin pa'i phyir rgyu ma nges par bstan pa na ni /
analyzed: bden te / de'i bskyed bya 'am des 'dus byas pa las yin pa'i phyir rgyu ma nges par bstan pa na ni /
translated: It is true that when the cause is taught as indeterminate, it is because it is the product of that or it is produced by that.

original: gal ta 'gas kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal ta 'gas kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if it is said that it is not the cause of anything,

original: snang ba nyid yod pa nyid yin na 'u bu cag la sogs pas mthong ba dang mthong bar gyur pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba las 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dbye ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: snang ba nyid yod pa nyid yin na 'u bu cag la sogs pas mthong ba dang mthong bar gyur pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba las 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dbye ba ma yin nam /
translated: if the existence of light itself is seen by us and others, is it not the case that it is distinguished as past, present, and future, because it is distinguished as seen and as not seen?

original: rnal 'byor pa'i ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not so for the yogi.

original: thams cad snang bzhin pa nyid kyis da ltar ba yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad snang bzhin pa nyid kyis da ltar ba yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: because everything is present because it is presently appearing.üîΩIf you think that,

original: gal te da ltar ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te da ltar ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is as stated in the following:üîΩ‚ÄúThe present is not like form, etc.üîΩIt is not like fire, because it does not appear.‚ÄùüîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.

original: gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du dus la mngon sum ma yin pa ni me la bzhin du ma yin te /üîΩmi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /üîΩdus ni tshad ma gang gis kyang zhes bya ba'o //üîΩdngos pos nye bar mngon du byed pa'i phyir rang bzhin mngon sum gyis bdag gir byas pa yin na /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du dus la mngon sum ma yin pa ni me la bzhin du ma yin te / mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni / dus ni tshad ma gang gis kyang zhes bya ba'o // dngos pos nye bar mngon du byed pa'i phyir rang bzhin mngon sum gyis bdag gir byas pa yin na /
translated: If it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.

original: don nye bar snang bar byed pa yin gyi rnam pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /üîΩmdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa'i zhes bya ba'o //üîΩbum pa zhes sam /üîΩg-yo ba zhes bya ba'i rnam pa gzhan du yang snang ba kho na ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: don nye bar snang bar byed pa yin gyi rnam pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni / mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa'i zhes bya ba'o // bum pa zhes sam / g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i rnam pa gzhan du yang snang ba kho na ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.üîΩIf it is apprehended by a valid cognition, then it is not unapprehendable.

original: de ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it were not so,üîΩ

original: mdun na gnas pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mdun na gnas pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because there is no difference between the apprehension of a form that is not present in front and the apprehension of a form that is present in front.üîΩIf it is said that the difference of the substance and the action is not apprehended simultaneously, etc., is not known by the cognition of simultaneity, etc.,

original: cig car ma yin par byas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdzas dang bya ba las tha dad pas de'i khyad par cig car ba la sogs pa'i shes pas rtogs par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: cig car ma yin par byas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdzas dang bya ba las tha dad pas de'i khyad par cig car ba la sogs pa'i shes pas rtogs par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: because it is different from the substance and the action,

original: de la rtags cung zad kyang 'brel pa can du dmigs pa ma yin /
analyzed: de la rtags cung zad kyang 'brel pa can du dmigs pa ma yin /
translated: then there is no sign whatsoever that is observed to be related to that.

original: gzugs med pa dang 'du ba las nam mkha' bzhin du mngon sum pa ma yin pa yang ma yin te /üîΩrtags las ma byung ba nyid @303a * //
analyzed: gzugs med pa dang 'du ba las nam mkha' bzhin du mngon sum pa ma yin pa yang ma yin te / rtags las ma byung ba nyid @303a * //
translated: And it is not non-perceptual, like space, which is not related to form and aggregation.üîΩBecause it is non-inferential

original: dang ; gnod pa med pa nyid kyis mngon sum tshad ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang ; gnod pa med pa nyid kyis mngon sum tshad ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and non-deceptive, it is a valid form of perception.

original: gzugs med pa dang 'du ba las zhes bya bar rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum dang 'gal ba yin na tshad ma ma yin no / nam mkha' ni mngon sum gyi shes pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir mngon sum pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa dang 'du ba las zhes bya bar rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum dang 'gal ba yin na tshad ma ma yin no / nam mkha' ni mngon sum gyi shes pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir mngon sum pa ma yin no //
translated: Space is not a perceptible object, and so it is not perceived.

original: gzugs dang 'du ba med pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs dang 'du ba med pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the absence of form and the absence of contact.

original: de lta yin na cig car dang cig car ma yin pa'i shes pa'i dbye bas dus gcig ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin na cig car dang cig car ma yin pa'i shes pa'i dbye bas dus gcig ma yin no //
translated: If it were, it would not be a single entity, because it would be divided into the two categories of simultaneous and nonsimultaneous.

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: It is not like that.

original: 'bras bu gcig la de gnyis med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig la de gnyis med pa'i phyir la /
translated: Because those two are not in a single effect.

original: de lta yin na ni shes pa gnyis su thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na ni shes pa gnyis su thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were, it would follow that there would be two cognitions.

original: de lta yin na de lta bu'i dbye bas gcig tu yang ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta yin na de lta bu'i dbye bas gcig tu yang ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: If it were like that, how could it be understood as a single entity by such a division?

original: gsal byed rdzas la sogs pa gnyis yod pa'i phyir mig btsums gcig dang / chu tshod la sogs pas gnyis gcod pa ni dngos po cig car mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gsal byed rdzas la sogs pa gnyis yod pa'i phyir mig btsums gcig dang / chu tshod la sogs pas gnyis gcod pa ni dngos po cig car mngon par gsal bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Because there are two illuminations of substance and so on, the closing of one eye and the cutting of two by a water clock and so on are the simultaneous illumination of a single thing.

original: de las bzlog pa ni cig shos kyi gsal byed yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni cig shos kyi gsal byed yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: The opposite of that is the other.

original: 'on te myur ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te myur ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, is it speed?

original: dus kyi dbye ba ni gsal byed kyi rdzas la sogs pa'i dbye ba tsam yin te /
analyzed: dus kyi dbye ba ni gsal byed kyi rdzas la sogs pa'i dbye ba tsam yin te /
translated: The division of time is merely the division of the substance of the manifest, etc.

original: de ltar brdar byas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar brdar byas pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is designated in that way.

original: dus kyi shes pa'i yul ni /
analyzed: dus kyi shes pa'i yul ni /
translated: The object of the cognition of time

original: dngos po gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po gzhan ma yin no //
translated: is not a different thing.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i shes gzugs la sogs pa'i dbyibs kyi khyad par lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i shes gzugs la sogs pa'i dbyibs kyi khyad par lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚ÄúIt is like the particular shape of a pot, etc.,‚Äù is taught.

original: dus ni yun ring po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dus ni yun ring po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Time is a long period, etc.

original: bden te / dngos po'i khyad par kho na de lta bu'i brda las de ltar shes pa'i yul yin la /
analyzed: bden te / dngos po'i khyad par kho na de lta bu'i brda las de ltar shes pa'i yul yin la /
translated: It is true that the particular thing itself is the object of the cognition that arises from the designation in that way.

original: gang gis de ltar 'gyur ba de ni dus yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: gang gis de ltar 'gyur ba de ni dus yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: But if you think that the cause of that is time,

original: gal te dus med na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te dus med na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: if there is no time, etc.

original: 'bras bu la yod pa'i dal ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi skyed byed nyid rang gi ngo bo'i skyed byed yin pa'i phyir dus nyid dngos po rnams kyi rgyu yin gyi dngos po rnams ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu la yod pa'i dal ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi skyed byed nyid rang gi ngo bo'i skyed byed yin pa'i phyir dus nyid dngos po rnams kyi rgyu yin gyi dngos po rnams ni ma yin no //
translated: because the cause of the particularities of leisure, etc. that exist in the effect is itself the cause of the essence.

original: de de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa ni gang zhig gang gi dbye bas byed pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: de de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa ni gang zhig gang gi dbye bas byed pa ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: That which is not the effect of something does not function by way of its divisions.

original: 'on te 'bras bu'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te 'bras bu'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if it is the effect of that, then it is not permanent.

original: rtag pa dang khyab pa can gyi dus ni bzlog pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa dang khyab pa can gyi dus ni bzlog pa med pa yin te /
translated: A permanent and pervasive time is not refuted,

original: nye ba ma btang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dus ni med pa ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye ba ma btang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dus ni med pa ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it does not relinquish what is near.

original: mi rtag pa dang khyab pa ma yin pa'i dus ni rkyen gyi dbang gis gsal ba yin zhes bya @303b ba'i phyogs su sems pa ni /
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang khyab pa ma yin pa'i dus ni rkyen gyi dbang gis gsal ba yin zhes bya @303b ba'i phyogs su sems pa ni /
translated: The idea that impermanent and nonpervasive time is manifested by the power of conditions is the position of the following verse:

original: 'on te dus zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te dus zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if it is called time.

original: gang kho na las dus kyi rim pa yin pa de kho na las 'bras bu'i rim pa yin du zin kyang gzhan dbang gi rim pa can gyi dus las ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gang kho na las dus kyi rim pa yin pa de kho na las 'bras bu'i rim pa yin du zin kyang gzhan dbang gi rim pa can gyi dus las ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Although the order of the effect is just the order of time, it is taught that it is not from the order of time that is dependent.

original: 'on te de nyid las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'on te de nyid las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: But if it is from that itself,

original: rang la yod pa'i rim pa yod pa'i phyir 'di ni rang nyid byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang la yod pa'i rim pa yod pa'i phyir 'di ni rang nyid byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because the order that exists in itself exists, the meaning is that this is not produced by itself.

original: dngos po dag gi lhan cig byed pa nyid cig car ba kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: dngos po dag gi lhan cig byed pa nyid cig car ba kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Aren‚Äôt the simultaneous conditions of things just that?

original: nye ba ma yin pa nyid ni cig car ba ma yin la /
analyzed: nye ba ma yin pa nyid ni cig car ba ma yin la /
translated: That which is not proximate is not simultaneous.

original: de dngos po tsam ni ma yin te /üîΩnye ba ma yin pa yin bzhin du lhan cig pa nyid la yang dngos po yod pas rim par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dis ni /
analyzed: de dngos po tsam ni ma yin te / nye ba ma yin pa yin bzhin du lhan cig pa nyid la yang dngos po yod pas rim par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dis ni /
translated: But that is not just a thing.

original: rim pa ma yin pa yang thal ches pa nyid du bstan par bya ba yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: rim pa ma yin pa yang thal ches pa nyid du bstan par bya ba yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Because a thing exists in simultaneity even while not being proximate, it follows that it is sequential. Therefore this is taught to be the overextension of the nonsequential.

original: rim pa nyid dus yin no zhes bya ba ni rim pa ma yin pa kho na zhes bya ba'i nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: rim pa nyid dus yin no zhes bya ba ni rim pa ma yin pa kho na zhes bya ba'i nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe very process is time‚Äù is a reference to ‚Äúonly the non-process.‚Äù

original: ma yin te rim pa ni lhan cig pa dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba la lhan cig pa dmigs pa ma yin pa las lhan cig par dmigs pa gzhan kho na yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te rim pa ni lhan cig pa dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba la lhan cig pa dmigs pa ma yin pa las lhan cig par dmigs pa gzhan kho na yin te /
translated: No, because the process is simultaneous and non-simultaneous. That which is simultaneous is not observed, but that which is observed as simultaneous is only another process.

original: dngos po'i dbye ba la gnas skabs kyi dbye bas rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po'i dbye ba la gnas skabs kyi dbye bas rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the distinction of states is the reason for the distinction of entities.

original: rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs kyi dbye bas khyad par du byas pa'i rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs kyi dbye bas khyad par du byas pa'i rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúdistinct from its own nature‚Äù means that it is distinct from its own nature that is distinguished by the distinction of states.

original: da ni dus gsum du rnam par gzhag pa ji ltar yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: da ni dus gsum du rnam par gzhag pa ji ltar yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Now, how is the tritemporal distinction established?

original: da ltar ba dang bya ba'i 'brel pa yod pa na da ltar ba yin la /
analyzed: da ltar ba dang bya ba'i 'brel pa yod pa na da ltar ba yin la /
translated: When the present is related to action, it is present.

original: 'das pa dang yin na 'das pa nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: 'das pa dang yin na 'das pa nyid yin zhing /
translated: When it is past, it is past.

original: ma 'ongs pa dang yin na ma 'ongs pa nyid do zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang yin na ma 'ongs pa nyid do zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: If it is present, it is present.

original: mthong 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mthong 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúif it is seen‚Äù indicates

original: dus med na mthong bar 'gyur ba nyid la sogs pa ji ltar zhes zer ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: dus med na mthong bar 'gyur ba nyid la sogs pa ji ltar zhes zer ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: that if there were no time, it would be illogical to say that something is seen, etc.

original: dmigs par gyur pa gang gi tshe ma dmigs pa de 'das pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni re re'i bdag nyid du rig par bya ba'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs par gyur pa gang gi tshe ma dmigs pa de 'das pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni re re'i bdag nyid du rig par bya ba'i dbye ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúwhen it is not perceived, it is past‚Äù indicates that time is a category that is to be understood as a separate entity.

original: de khas mi len na dus su smra bas gsal gyi dbye ba ma rtogs pas ji ltar smra bar byed /üîΩkhyed kyis dus gang gi tshe grong la sogs pa'i dus gang byung ba zhes grong la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid kho na bde bar gnas sam /
analyzed: de khas mi len na dus su smra bas gsal gyi dbye ba ma rtogs pas ji ltar smra bar byed / khyed kyis dus gang gi tshe grong la sogs pa'i dus gang byung ba zhes grong la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid kho na bde bar gnas sam /
translated: If you do not accept this, then how can you, who do not understand the distinction between the manifest and unmanifest, speak of time?

original: mi bde bar gnas zhes 'jig rten gyi dri ba'i yul yin gyi tha dad pa can ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mi bde bar gnas zhes 'jig rten gyi dri ba'i yul yin gyi tha dad pa can ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: You ask, ‚ÄúAt what time does a village, etc., arise?‚Äù You ask this because the nature of a village, etc., is the object of worldly inquiry, not because it is a separate entity.

original: dus gang yin zhes @304a * //
analyzed: dus gang yin zhes @304a * //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúat what time‚Äù indicatesüîΩthat time is a separate entity.

original: bya ba'o // 'dri na zhes bya ba ni 'dri ba'i yul la'o //
analyzed: bya ba'o // 'dri na zhes bya ba ni 'dri ba'i yul la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf asked‚Äù means if asked by the object of inquiry.

original: rnal 'byor pa la ni thams cad snang bzhin pa kho na yin pa'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba med pas de ji ltar rig pa yin zhes pa las gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la ni thams cad snang bzhin pa kho na yin pa'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba med pas de ji ltar rig pa yin zhes pa las gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Since everything appears to the yogi, there is no distinction of past and so on. Therefore, how can he know?

original: des mthong ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas mthong ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: des mthong ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas mthong ba nyid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù means by the yogi‚Äôs seeing.

original: de la ltos nas dbye ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ltos nas dbye ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: In that case, there is no distinction in terms of the yogi himself.

original: mthong bzhin pa nyid tsam da ltar ba'i tha snyad kyi rgyu ma yin pa'i don to //
analyzed: mthong bzhin pa nyid tsam da ltar ba'i tha snyad kyi rgyu ma yin pa'i don to //
translated: The point is that mere seeing is not the cause of the convention of the present.

original: de'i phyir de ltar 'u bu cag la sogs pa la ltos nas rnal 'byor pa la 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba yin gyi rang nyid ni ma yin no zhes bstan nas lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kyis dngos po rnams ni rang gi ngo
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar 'u bu cag la sogs pa la ltos nas rnal 'byor pa la 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba yin gyi rang nyid ni ma yin no zhes bstan nas lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kyis dngos po rnams ni rang gi ngo
translated: Therefore, in that case, the distinction of past and so on is in terms of us and so on in relation to the yogi, but not in terms of the yogi himself. Having taught that, in terms of things that are not hidden, the yogi sees the nature of things as it is.

original: bor snang ba 'das pa la sogs pa la yang 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: bor snang ba 'das pa la sogs pa la yang 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: Also, the past, etc., are transformations.

original: da ltar ba nyid la sogs pa ni dus kyi khyad par yin la /
analyzed: da ltar ba nyid la sogs pa ni dus kyi khyad par yin la /
translated: The present, etc., are distinctions of time.

original: shes pa dang de'i nges par bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rang nyid la yang 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa dang de'i nges par bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rang nyid la yang 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The cognition and its ascertainment are also transformations for the yogi himself.

original: gzhan yang dus de dang 'brel pas zhes bya ba'o //üîΩda ltar ba nyid dang 'das pa la sogs pa rang gi ngo bos gsal ba yin na de ltar 'das pa dang cig shos ji ltar tha dad pa yin snyam du sems pa la 'u bu cag la sogs pa dang rnal 'byor pa'i sems da ltar ba rang
analyzed: gzhan yang dus de dang 'brel pas zhes bya ba'o // da ltar ba nyid dang 'das pa la sogs pa rang gi ngo bos gsal ba yin na de ltar 'das pa dang cig shos ji ltar tha dad pa yin snyam du sems pa la 'u bu cag la sogs pa dang rnal 'byor pa'i sems da ltar ba rang
translated: Moreover, because of the connection with that time, etc.üîΩIf the present, past, etc., were manifest by their own nature, how would the past, etc., be different from that?

original: gi rgyu'i dbang gis dmigs pa yin gyi snang ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gi rgyu'i dbang gis dmigs pa yin gyi snang ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The present mind of us, etc., and the yogi is the object by the power of its cause, but it is not an appearance.

original: de'i phyir de'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the presentation of that is stated:

original: 'o na de ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na de ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But how is that?

original: mi 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni snang ba zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni snang ba zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Because it is not apprehended should be connected with appearance.

original: gal te yang da ltar mthong ba 'di de nyid mthong ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gal te yang da ltar mthong ba 'di de nyid mthong ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: If it is taught that what is seen now is the seeing of thatness,

original: da ltar ba'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: da ltar ba'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then it is the present.

original: gzhan gyi ni snang ba'i'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni snang ba'i'o //
translated: The other is the appearance.

original: gang zhig gang gi zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'i'o //üîΩde'i tshe ste de'i dus dang 'brel pas sam /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'i'o // de'i tshe ste de'i dus dang 'brel pas sam /
translated: That which is the person‚ÄôsüîΩat that time,

original: de'i dus ma yin pa dang 'brel pa can ni gang gi ngo bor rig pa ni de'i ste skyes bu'i'o //
analyzed: de'i dus ma yin pa dang 'brel pa can ni gang gi ngo bor rig pa ni de'i ste skyes bu'i'o //
translated: that is, connected with that time, or not connected with that time, is the nature of that, the person‚Äôs.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni de'i dus kho na la'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni de'i dus kho na la'o zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Its nature is just at that time.üîΩThe name of that, the object of comprehension connected with another time of the object, is the present.

original: de'i ming zhes bya ba ni don gyi dus gzhan dang 'brel pa can gyi gzhal bya ni mthong ba po'i rjes su byed bzhin pa'i dus dang 'brel pa can ni rang gi rgyu'i gzhan dbang yin par bstan nas /
analyzed: de'i ming zhes bya ba ni don gyi dus gzhan dang 'brel pa can gyi gzhal bya ni mthong ba po'i rjes su byed bzhin pa'i dus dang 'brel pa can ni rang gi rgyu'i gzhan dbang yin par bstan nas /
translated: Having taught that it is the dependent nature of its cause,

original: da ni mthong ba po dang snang ba dag da ltar ba nyid mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs la yin la /
analyzed: da ni mthong ba po dang snang ba dag da ltar ba nyid mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs la yin la /
translated: now, the seer and the appearance are the same in the present, in the context of equipoise.

original: dus phyis ni dus tha dad pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: dus phyis ni dus tha dad pa nyid yin te /
translated: Later, they are different times.

original: da ltar ba dang cig shos nyid @304b kyis so zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: da ltar ba dang cig shos nyid @304b kyis so zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The present and the other are the two times.

original: gzhan yang de'i tshe ni byed pa po yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i tshe ni byed pa po yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Moreover, at that time, the agent

original: yang gi sgras ni gzhal bya yang zhes bya ba sdud par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni gzhal bya yang zhes bya ba sdud par byed pa yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù includes the object of cognition.

original: de'i dus nyid du ni rtogs pa'i dus nyid du'o //
analyzed: de'i dus nyid du ni rtogs pa'i dus nyid du'o //
translated: At that time means at the time of understanding.

original: da ltar ba'i dus nyid yin no //üîΩphyis ni ldang ba'i dus su'o /
analyzed: da ltar ba'i dus nyid yin no // phyis ni ldang ba'i dus su'o /
translated: It is the present time.üîΩLater means at the time of arising.

original: dus gzhan nyid du ni mthong ba po'i da ltar ba nyid dang 'das pa nyid dang snang ba yin no //
analyzed: dus gzhan nyid du ni mthong ba po'i da ltar ba nyid dang 'das pa nyid dang snang ba yin no //
translated: At another time means the present and past of the seer.

original: gzhan nyid du zhes bya ba ni phyogs par ma rgyas par bya ba'i phyir dran par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan nyid du zhes bya ba ni phyogs par ma rgyas par bya ba'i phyir dran par byed pa yin la /
translated: The word ‚Äúother‚Äù is used to remind one of the non-expansion of the position.

original: de nyid rgyas par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid rgyas par bstan pa ni /
translated: The expansion of that is taught:

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /üîΩde'i dus nyid du ni 'das pa'i dus nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ste / de'i dus nyid du ni 'das pa'i dus nyid do //
translated: Therefore meansüîΩat that time means at the time of the past.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'i dus kyis gzhal bya nyid la ste /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'i dus kyis gzhal bya nyid la ste /
translated: There means in the object of cognition by the present time.

original: lkag tu ma gyur pa nyid tsam gyi yul nyid kyis mngon sum 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lkag tu ma gyur pa nyid tsam gyi yul nyid kyis mngon sum 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the object is not directly perceived because it is not a mute.

original: bu dang ldan pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i bu dang 'brel pa can nyid ni rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum du byed pa bzhin pa de'i mngon sum du yang cis mi 'gyur /
analyzed: bu dang ldan pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i bu dang 'brel pa can nyid ni rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum du byed pa bzhin pa de'i mngon sum du yang cis mi 'gyur /
translated: Why is it not directly perceived by the yogi that the man who has a son is related to the future son?

original: rung ba ma dmigs bzhin pa ni yod pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: rung ba ma dmigs bzhin pa ni yod pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: The idea that the non-apprehension of the possible is non-existent is

original: 'on te yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: but if,

original: de dang lhan cig pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
translated: the characteristic of being simultaneous is only future.

original: de'i phyir bu dang ldan pa'i mi rung ba ma dmigs pa med pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir bu dang ldan pa'i mi rung ba ma dmigs pa med pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, the non-apprehension of the impossible for the man who has a son does not prove non-existence.

original: rnal 'byor pas ni rtags kyi khyad par ma lus pa la nges pa can ni mngon sum dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni rtags kyi khyad par ma lus pa la nges pa can ni mngon sum dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: The yogi, who has direct perception of all the particularities of the reason,

original: ji ltar ston sogs zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar ston sogs zhes bya ba ste /
translated: just as, for example, the man who has a son,

original: dus der ldan ni da ltar gyi dus su ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dus der ldan ni da ltar gyi dus su ldan pa'o //
translated: at that time, he has a son, in the present time.

original: de yis mthong med ni rnal 'byor pas so //
analyzed: de yis mthong med ni rnal 'byor pas so //
translated: He does not see, the yogi.

original: de ltar ma rtogs na yang zhes bya bas ni rnal 'byor pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus nyid yin pas na /üîΩma dmigs pa yang skyon yod min //üîΩzhes bya ba ni rung ba ma yin pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ltar ma rtogs na yang zhes bya bas ni rnal 'byor pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus nyid yin pas na / ma dmigs pa yang skyon yod min // zhes bya ba ni rung ba ma yin pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: And also not understood means that the yogi has not understood it.üîΩAnd also not observed means that there is no fault in the non-observation of the object of negation,

original: gnod pa nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid med par nges pa bskal pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod pa nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid med par nges pa bskal pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not ascertained to be nonexistent, which is the characteristic of a fault.

original: gal te de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni ston la sogs pa'i dus su yang ngo //
analyzed: gal te de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni ston la sogs pa'i dus su yang ngo //
translated: Even at that time means even at the time of teaching, etc.

original: rnal 'byor pa ma yin pas ma dmigs pa dang / rnal 'byor pas dmigs pa kho na la dngos po 'di yod pa yin zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di la gnod pa can cis med pa yin /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ma yin pas ma dmigs pa dang / rnal 'byor pas dmigs pa kho na la dngos po 'di yod pa yin zhes bya ba'i phyogs 'di la gnod pa can cis med pa yin /
translated: If one thinks, This thing exists because it is not observed by the non-yogi and is observed by the yogi, what fault is there in this position?

original: yul mtshungs pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: yul mtshungs pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Because the object is the same, one thinks, There is no fault.

original: 'on te ji ltar des zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te ji ltar des zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if one thinks, How is it that the yogi does not observe it?

original: gal te yang ring po ma yin pa na gnas pas ches shin tu chung ba la sogs pa'i khyad par la yod pa'i dngos po rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te yang ring po ma yin pa na gnas pas ches shin tu chung ba la sogs pa'i khyad par la yod pa'i dngos po rtogs pa yin no //
translated: If it is not far away, then it is the object that is very small, etc. that is perceived.

original: thag ring po na gnas pas @305a * //
analyzed: thag ring po na gnas pas @305a * //
translated: But if it is far away,

original: ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ni ma yin te /
translated: it is not.

original: nye bar rung ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i dpe bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nye bar rung ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i dpe bstan pa ni /
translated: The example that is taught is:

original: ji ltar gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Just as another,

original: ring po ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa dang 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: ring po ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa dang 'brel pa yin no //
translated: in relation to what is not far away.

original: phra mo la sogs pa ni ches shin tu chung ba la sogs pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: phra mo la sogs pa ni ches shin tu chung ba la sogs pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: Small, etc. is a particular that is very small, etc.

original: rung ba'i yul na gnas pa yang thams cad kyis ni mtshungs par rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rung ba'i yul na gnas pa yang thams cad kyis ni mtshungs par rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: And even though it is in a suitable place, it is not perceived by all.

original: skad cig ma nyid la sogs pas bsgribs pa dang zhen pa nyid kyis dbang po rnams kho na tha dad pa yin par bstan pa ni /üîΩgang la gcig gi nus yod pa //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid la sogs pas bsgribs pa dang zhen pa nyid kyis dbang po rnams kho na tha dad pa yin par bstan pa ni / gang la gcig gi nus yod pa //
translated: It is taught that the senses themselves are different because of being obscured by momentariness, etc. and by attachment:

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Where there is the capacity of one,üîΩit is not the capacity of another.

original: rnal 'byor ba ni dbang po gsal ba yin pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid kyis kyang nye ba'i phyir mthong ba kho na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba ni dbang po gsal ba yin pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid kyis kyang nye ba'i phyir mthong ba kho na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since the yogi has clear faculties and since the object is to be inferred, it is said to be seen.

original: de de ltar slob dpon rnams kyi bzhed gzhung bstan nas mi 'dod pa nyid ston pa yin la /
analyzed: de de ltar slob dpon rnams kyi bzhed gzhung bstan nas mi 'dod pa nyid ston pa yin la /
translated: Having thus taught the position of the masters, he now teaches what is not accepted.

original: de la yang rnal 'byor pa la snang bzhin pa nyid kyis da ltar ba kho na yin la /
analyzed: de la yang rnal 'byor pa la snang bzhin pa nyid kyis da ltar ba kho na yin la /
translated: Moreover, since it appears to the yogi, it is only present.

original: gzhan gyis ni snang bzhin pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yang brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs mi 'dod par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni snang bzhin pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yang brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs mi 'dod par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since it does not appear to others, it is also said to be past and future. The position that this is not accepted is taught.

original: 'on te yang gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye ba ma yin pa thag ring pa na gnas pas snang bzhin pa ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te yang gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye ba ma yin pa thag ring pa na gnas pas snang bzhin pa ma yin pa ni /
translated: If it is not near, but far away, and does not appear,

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs par yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs par yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it is not past or future.

original: de nyid ni da ltar ba'i mtshan nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid ni da ltar ba'i mtshan nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught to be the characteristic of the present.

original: gang phyir dmigs pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang phyir dmigs pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because of that, the so-called objectüîΩis not established as the object of the mind.

original: rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa dag ni yod pa dang med pa dag dang da ltar ba dang cig shos dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa dag ni yod pa dang med pa dag dang da ltar ba dang cig shos dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúrealized and unrealized‚Äù is ‚Äúexistent and nonexistent‚Äù and ‚Äúpresent and other.‚Äù

original: dngos po ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus kho na la rnam pa thams cad dang rjes su dpag pas lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa can du byed la lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kho nar da ltar ba la yang da ltar ba nyid ma yin
analyzed: dngos po ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus kho na la rnam pa thams cad dang rjes su dpag pas lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa can du byed la lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid kho nar da ltar ba la yang da ltar ba nyid ma yin
